title: Developing large language models to detect adverse drug events in posts on x
details: Y Deng, Y Xing, J Quach, X Chen, X Wu, Y Zhang… - Journal of …, 2024
abstract: Adverse drug events (ADEs) are one of the major causes of hospital admissions and are associated with increased morbidity and mortality. Post-marketing ADE identification is one of the most important phases of drug safety surveillance …
